cause.description:
On Wednesday, August 15th, mankato resident and human rights activist David Kalligher will be announcing publically at the Centennial Student Union at the Minnesota State University - Mankato at 2:00pm his candidacy for the Minnesota State House of Representatives, District 23B. This district includes all of the Greater Mankato Area, Lower North Mankato and all the way to St. Peter.
Durring the campaign major issues will be addressed and the people will be heard. David's goal is to do at least door knockings to at least 6,000 different homes in the area. "Standing up for all citizens, fighting the fights that need fighing and going to them as their representative to get their ideas, opinions and concerns is the way to run effective government for all people." -David Kalligher
All interested students and other community members are strongly encouraged to take part in this widely associated grass-roots campaign. Lots of activities and meet and greets are in the works.
This cause here on facebook is in place to keep you in touch with the campaign, as well as David's official facebook page for the campaign too. Please check back often. Updates are daily.
1. Higher Education, Lowering College Tuition and Affordable Student Housing
2. Protecting Senior Citizens Rights, Securing and Protecting Social Security
3. Affordable, Quality Health Care Coverage
4. Paying off the state-wide debt
5. Representing Everyone as a Whole, with the same type of Dignity and Respect
cause.name: David Kalligher for State Representative
